Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -proot --default-character-set=utf8mb4 socialmeet -e "
SELECT p.id, p.content, p.location, p.like_count, p.comment_count, u.nickname
FROM posts p
JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC;
")
Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -proot --default-character-set=utf8mb4 socialmeet -e "SELECT id, nickname, phone FROM users LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\MySQL\MySQL Server 8.0\bin\mysql.exe" -u root -proot --default-character-set=utf8mb4 socialmeet -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as message_count FROM messages; SELECT COUNT(*) as call_count FROM call_records; SELECT COUNT(*) as relationship_count FROM user_relationships;")
